mapper.sql: ac_news_id, ac_news_title, ac_news_date, ac_news_time, ac_news_context, ac_news_status, ac_news_type, ac_news_sourse, ac_news_views
mapper.select: select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=1 order by ac_news_id DESC limit 0,1
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=2 order by ac_news_id DESC limit 0,4
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=1 order by ac_news_id DESC limit 1,4
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 order by ac_news_id DESC limit 0,4
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 order by ac_news_id DESC
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=2 order by ac_news_id DESC
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=1 order by ac_news_id DESC
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 order by ac_news_id DESC limit ${page},${rows}
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=2 order by ac_news_id DESC limit ${page},${rows}
select * from ac_news where ac_news_status=1 and ac_news_type=1 order by ac_news_id DESC limit ${page},${rows}
select * from ac_news where ac_news_title like '%${title}%' limit ${start},${end}
mapper.insert:
insert into ac_news
ac_news_id,
ac_news_title,
ac_news_date,
ac_news_time,
ac_news_context,
ac_news_status,
ac_news_type,
ac_news_sourse,
ac_news_views,

mapper.update:
update ac_news
ac_news_title = #{acNewsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ac_news_date = #{acNewsDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ac_news_time = #{acNewsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ac_news_context = #{acNewsContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ac_news_status = #{acNewsStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ac_news_type = #{acNewsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ac_news_sourse = #{acNewsSourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ac_news_views = #{acNewsViews,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ac_news_id = #{acNewsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ac_news set ac_news_title = #{acNewsTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_news_date = #{acNewsDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_news_time = #{acNewsTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_news_context = #{acNewsContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_news_status = #{acNewsStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ac_news_type = #{acNewsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ac_news_sourse = #{acNewsSourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_news_views = #{acNewsViews,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ac_news_id = #{acNewsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
